issues.title: Optimize database query performance for user search
issues.description: The user search functionality is experiencing slow response times due to inefficient database queries. Need to add proper indexing and optimize the search algorithm to handle large user datasets.

issues.title: Fix authentication bug in login form
issues.description: Users are unable to login with valid credentials. The authentication service returns a 401 error even with correct username and password.

issues.title: Implement dark mode toggle
issues.description: Add a dark mode feature to improve user experience during night time usage. Should persist user preference in localStorage.

issues.title: Database migration for user profiles
issues.description: Create migration scripts to add new fields to user profile table: avatar_url, bio, and social_links.

issues.title: Performance optimization for dashboard
issues.description: Dashboard takes too long to load with large datasets. Need to implement pagination and lazy loading for better performance.

issues.title: Add unit tests for API endpoints
issues.description: Write comprehensive unit tests for all REST API endpoints to ensure reliability and catch regressions early.

issues.title: Update documentation for new features
issues.description: Update user documentation and API docs to reflect the new features added in version 2.1.0.

issues.title: Fix mobile responsive layout issues
issues.description: Several pages have layout issues on mobile devices. Navigation menu overlaps content and buttons are too small to tap.

issues.title: Implement email notifications
issues.description: Add email notification system for important events like password changes, account updates, and system maintenance.

issues.title: Refactor legacy code in utils module
issues.description: Clean up and modernize the utilities module. Remove deprecated functions and improve code readability.

issues.title: Security audit for file upload feature
issues.description: Conduct security review of file upload functionality to prevent malicious file uploads and ensure proper validation.
